Title: Increases increasing the per student rate of empire state after school program grants
Summary: Increases the per student rate of empire state after school program grants to two thousand dollars; requires future per student rates to be modified accounting for any minimum wage adjustments.
LawCode: Add ยง501-i, Exec L; amd ยง1, Chap 53 of 2021
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and chapter 53 of the laws of 2021, enacting the state localities budget, in relation to increasing the per student rate of empire state after school program grants
